reviews.review_text: You can't go wrong with this tracker! For the price, it's a steal. The face fell off of my expensive name brand tracker and I wanted a quick replacement. My expectations weren't too high for the price, but i was pleasantly surprised!! Quick shipping too. So glad I purchased this....

I was not home receiving the item from Walmart, but my friend and my neighbor Jan picked it up for me while I was out doing errands. I got home and she handed it to me and I love it. I'm reading the directions and it's pink, which is my favorite color and I thank you for doing an awesome job.

reviews.title: Its a good way to get you up and moving
reviews.review_text: Its very easy to use. We wanted it for the fitbit aspect of it. It buzzes when you have been sitting too long. The app works well with it. My husband wears his to bed but I dont and the battery life shows it. Its new so the battery is great now, ask me in a year or 2 about it!

It waz delivered on time very easy to setup took me less then 20 minutes for set up. I will give report back in a week or so about the other functions as i just got it today. Im definitely gonna get one for my son.the only thing i dont like is the band but thats ok im gonna buy one.

Perfect tracker for activity. My main activity is walking, so it is fine for that. I dislike that it has a whole app that I feel has its own tracking of my life. I don't like it could not just sync to the health app in my phone. Also you have to re sync it after it charges or you recharge your phone. But other than that it does what it says.

Just got this watch a few days ago. The instructons were a little hard to follow for the set up. Also, I'm disappointed that it doesn't do notifications for RCS texts. All the other notifications and features work great though. I think over all still a good purchase for the price, if you're looking for a "simple" smart watch.

reviews.title: decent steps tracker. not quality material.
reviews.review_text: i admit i haven't used it much but heres my review. the band is kinda cheap i don't know how well it will hold up. i haven't had a chance to sleep in it but i'll decide if im keeping it at the end of 24 hours when i compare it to my fitbit. it uses the metrics system so its probably not going to 100% accurate for weight tracking. i didn't see anywhere to track food or water like fitbit. it might be a halfway decent alternative for tracking steps only. ill keep for a few days and work through the apps use. i recommend if you are just wanting to track steps mostly. i don't use the calling or text features. was simple to set up . comes with charger. I gave 3 stars but honestly I should have given 2.

reviews.title: Cheap Watch Band
reviews.review_text: bought it for my teenage daughter seemed to track well and battery was ok for the price had it less than 2 months and the watch band broke. i couldn't find a replacement, so ended up ordering another watch.

the charger wouldn't connect. it was a magnetic connection, but it just repelled and bounced off the watch no matter where you tried to put it in any direction, and the manual didnt give any help or instructions either. so if the device actually works, I'll never know.

reviews.title: Just don't.
reviews.review_text: Very basic, doesn't store or send information. You have to reconnect it via QR code or thru the app after every charge, the charge lasting about 2 days. None of the data gathered is sent to your iphone, so I guess, what, am I supposed to write it all down at the end of the day before it 4esets all parameters to 0? Stupid.
this is my very first fitness smartwatch. it definitely helps reading the instruction manual. apparently the watch is linked to your/our smartphone. Which goes well with my new smartphone ‚ò∫Ô∏è
it does track steps accurately. I went grocery shopping, and it said I was sitting for too long. Im sure it was because I pushed a cart for the 45 minutes. It tracks more hand movement and not steps

It would have 5* if I could use it for the purpose it was ordered. I got it to work with Humana's go365 program. Unfortunately they don't accept this brand. Maybe you can reach out to Humana and try to work something out with them.

reviews.title: "Just" watch with Time üòû üö´‚õîÔ∏è
reviews.review_text: download an app. if you disconnect Bluetooth at any moment, it stops the time from changing on watch. The "fitness" part doesn't work like it should. if you're just looking for a watch that is rechargeable just for the time. then this is it. i download a face for the watch from the app, but it keeps reseting for some reason. so i stopped using the downloaded one. i do like the size of the screen. the battery lasts a lot longer than my samssung 3 watch ever did. so depending on what you're looking for, it depends on you wamt this watch. Go get you a fitbit instead!

reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
reviews.review_text: Kinda disappointed in this watch. I got it mostly to track steps but it isn't catching all of them. My app on my phone is catching them more than this. The other things are nice on it but if you're like me and mostly want it to track steps I feel it does go more off of arm movement than actual steps. (My phone in my pocket has double the steps compared to this.)

reviews.title: Feature-Packed and Budget-Friendly
reviews.review_text: This smartwatch paired instantly with my Android phone, and setup was a breeze with the intuitive menu. The variety of features is incredible. It has step tracking, heart rate and blood pressure monitoring, sleep analysis, and even a water intake reminder. I love the 100 customizable watch faces and the lightweight, comfortable design. It syncs seamlessly with notifications, making it easy to stay connected without constantly checking my phone. The Find My Phone function is super handy, and the waterproof design means I can wear it while swimming. My husband, who‚Äôs not a "watch guy," even finds it comfortable and useful!

I was looking for an inexpensive fitness watch to track my basic health data and exercise routines. This fitness watch fits the bill. Accuracy and tracking are reasonably consistent with my iPhone. The app allows quick changes to the display and basic functions. Setup and sync with my other apps was smooth and easy. The band is lightweight and a bit thin but no problems so far. Definitely worth the money for me.

I see why this item was on a flash sale... it only goes to 2022! Totally useless. Why do you do this to your customers.. Now i feel like you all are out to get us...just to make a buck. Shame on all of you. All I can say is, thanks a lot.

Setting up this watch shouldn't be so difficult. Everything is in Spanish...no menu or any way to change that. Very limited instructions. Font is so small no one in my household could read it. While you are trying to work on the screen...it shuts iff repeatedly. Very frustrating. I have to return it.

reviews.title: Difficult to set up
reviews.review_text: Instructions are microscopic. Before using watch is in Spanish. No instructions how to change language. Need GloryFit app to use. Unable to login to app with email. Used Apple Gmail feature, connected to watch, watch is now in English. Information on watch screen doesn't stay on long enough. It's not measuring my steps; not sure why. Might be returning this item!!

reviews.title: Great for encouraging exercise!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the 'watch' because I wanted to get a count of my daily steps. As I was new to this whole process (and am very low-tech), I could have used a little more detail in the instructions. Nevertheless, it was pretty easy to get it communicating with my phone. I was pleasantly surprised at the additional measures and functions.

reviews.title: Great Fitness Watch %26 More!
reviews.review_text: My Fitbit died after 5 years. I was looking for a reasonable priced fitness watch to replace it. I ordered this watch and was so surprised with all its functions . It tracks my steps and exercises, my sleep, heart rate, o2 levels. It also lets me know when I'm getting a message or phone call and the weather. I absolutely love this watch!
I always wanted one of these watches but it was out of my financial reach, LOL. I love the watch it works great and I'm happy I bought it
after giving my information for registration, not supposed to be charged, my card was charged twice in 60 seconds
So far it is working great! Much better than my Fitbit which died after a year right after the 1 yr return warranty
I love it!! it helps me keep track of my heart rate and steps everyday. you can also download different watch faces for it!!
I love it, and helps me keep up with my steps and health. Wondetful to have and the price was great.

reviews.title: Great noise canceling
reviews.review_text: The earbuds are small enough to fit in my pocket. I use them at home when my kids are arguing and screaming ‚Äî it keeps me in good moods. When I wear them I barely hear their noises. They are good for talking as well.

reviews.title: Doesn't work for me.
reviews.review_text: Too small for me. I have a hard time reading it and then by the time I can see it it's gone. I tried for a few weeks but now just sits on my counter. Probably good for younger people that want a smart watch but don't want to break the bank.
The app constantly crashes so it is hard to keep track accurately. the watch itself works well. I wouldn't purchase again.

reviews.title: Not really appropriate for seiors
reviews.review_text: The item is not very suitable for seniors. The instructions for use are not clear. The display is a little small without good eyesight.

reviews.title: Watch
reviews.review_text: Really good watch band, measures all my daily activity, I like that I can see messages and phone calls, it fits good on my wrist.

reviews.title: Good value and it works well
reviews.review_text: I have had it for about three weeks, and so far, it's worked well. The battery lasts two weeks or more. There are lots of options also.

reviews.title: step watch
reviews.review_text: i really like the weight of this watch, i use it for counting steps. it seems to be accurate. i cant figure out how to change date %26 time on it, there were no instructions with it, on how....? But, for steps, it's great!

reviews.title: Inaccurate
reviews.review_text: It counts moving your arm and car rides as steps which in turn changes your burned calories for the day, very inaccurate but if you just looking for a customizable watch it's nice.

reviews.title: Functions Great, feature info display small
reviews.review_text: Delivered on time. My grandson is obsessed with it. Besides the clock read out, the other displays are pretty small. He's only had it for one day, so unable to give a comprehensive opinion.

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: This fitness tracker watch is great, it is a feature-packed smart watch that stands out for its performance, design, and usability. With its sleek screen display, it offers excellent visibility and an intuitive interface, making it incredibly easy to use.

reviews.title: A gift that I almost returned.
reviews.review_text: This was a sweet gift to me that I almost returned because I wasn't able to download the app from Google Play. Google have rules and restrictions in place for security reasons and that's understandable. Google wanted me to pair my phone with its google play app . . .I didn't want to do that. However, I found an alternate route to use for downloading the GloryFit app, a safe website that allows you to download without having to sign in to an account. After installing the download and connecting with Bluetooth to my old Samsung Galaxy phone I spent about 15 minutes getting used to the watch and it is wonderful. The time automatically syncs with the time on your phone. I changed the watch face and setup everything with ease. I still have some exploring to do but for now it's set to cover what I want the most. It is a beautiful watch and it's comfortable. I look forward to measuring my sleep.
Very nice slender watch face. It has multiple face images to choose from. I really like it!

reviews.title: Doesn't work at all.
reviews.review_text: Can't get it to work with my Motorola 2025 android phone, It won't connect to its own application.
I love this watch. It keeps me on track will walking and bike riding.

reviews.title: Good for price
reviews.review_text: This watch is pretty for the price. A few glitches here and there but all in all pretty good
Amazing! I only wanted steps %26 HR but this is so much more!

reviews.title: No for me
reviews.review_text: Doesn't track steps unless arm is swinging and sometimes not even then.

reviews.title: step tracking doesnt work
reviews.review_text: doesn't accurately track steps or sleep, which is the main reason i bought it.

reviews.title: Fitness Tracker
reviews.review_text: Gives all your information at your fingertips.
It doesn't hold a charge for very long. Also it's app is glory fit
Won't pair to phone, use full for some of the functions
Love to watch it's very easy to navigate and the price was right
Exactly what I needed, great price, band a little long but can adjust for lady.
Temp feature stoped working but the rest is great. It is easy to read and use.
For $23, this was a steal. It tracks everything accurately, and so far, I have needed to charge it every 4 days.

reviews.title: Can't use my purchase.
reviews.review_text: My device stopped working after the return date. I had purchased the warranty but don't have the receipt because it was purchased online.
Didnt give it 5 stars because it doesnt alert me when ive been sitting too long.
Had watch for 2 months and stoped charging. Will not charge or turn on at all
great little fit bit for the right price cant beat it and accurate too
Much better quality than I expected, charge holds for a long time, very nice...
Fits comfortably, the sleep tracking is really great.

reviews.title: Tracker
reviews.review_text: Very nice tracker. Pretty and so far works fine. I like smaller screen and has many face screens to select from. Overall so far i give it a 5 star.
I love this watch. It keeps my steps. Exercise walking, running swimming. Pulse rate, It monitors my sleep. Text messages and phone.

reviews.title: Pretty in pink but stopped working in a week
reviews.review_text: Wore one week and it will no longer wake when arm lifted; it did at first. Paid $20 but barely got that much use of it.

reviews.title: Not Brand Name
reviews.review_text: This watch provides the information I need. So far for the price it's okay, need different band, looking for some.

It‚Äôs perfect for both workouts and everyday wear. The screen size is just right, and the touch response is smooth. After a full charge, it lasts me about a week. Once you download the app, pairing it with your phone is a breeze

reviews.title: FUN EASY
reviews.review_text: I loved it. It has exceeded my expectations! It's not just a step tracker; it offers comprehensive health monitoring around the clock. I particularly appreciate the detailed heart rate, blood oxygen, and blood pressure measurements.

reviews.title: The tracker performed well
reviews.review_text: The tracker has a sleek, modern look with a minimalist design that feels premium. The band is lightweight and comfortable enough to wear all day, and it didn‚Äôt irritate my skin even after a workout.

reviews.title: Love this watch
reviews.review_text: This smart watch is a great value! The screen is clear, and the 24 sports modes cover all my activities. Step counting and the virtual pacer work well, and battery life lasts 5-6 days. It‚Äôs a reliable and affordable tracker.
Beautiful and easy setup. Very comfortable to wear.
i really like it except for the band other than that its really good!
It serves its purposes. Do not like it as much as my previous Fitbit but the price was right

reviews.title: Great fitness tracker.
reviews.review_text: Great item, superbly packaged and delivered quickly.

reviews.title: Love watch
reviews.review_text: Love it. Simple and small. Easy to hook up to phone
Super just friendly app. I love the watch itself but wish the band was more comfortable.

reviews.title: smart watch
reviews.review_text: Very pretty, looks nice but will not connect to my phone, and wont allow manual set up

reviews.title: Won't charge, won't come on
reviews.review_text: Put it on charge, would never come on. Tried 4 different adapters %26 still never came on.
